title: Commerce Secretary Raimondo on why we need to produce chips in the U.S.
itunes:title: Commerce Secretary Raimondo on why we need to produce chips in the U.S.
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: The Senate voted this week to advance legislation that’s supposed to help the United States compete with China on computer chip manufacturing.The bill would give American companies more than $50 billion in federal subsidies to incentivize them to make semiconductors in the U.S. Marketplace’s Marielle Segarra speaks with Secretary of Commerce Gina Raimondo, an advocate of the bill, who says national security is one reason to make semiconductors a domestic product.
